code:
flowchart TB
  src --> apps
  src --> common
  src --> modules
  src --> protocols
  src --> schemas

  subgraph apps
    api[Infra_WorkerNode]
  end

  subgraph common
    cache[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    circuit[Infra_WorkerNode]
    consul[Infra_IngressController]
    cqrs[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    dbconf[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    email[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    env[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    ff[Infra_RedisCache]
    health[Infra_RedisCache]
    http[Infra_RedisCache]
    jaeger[Infra_RedisCache]
    logger[Infra_WorkerNode]
    messaging[Infra_IngressController]
    mongo[Infra_WorkerNode]
    otel[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    prisma[Infra_WorkerNode]
    storage[Infra_WorkerNode]
  end

  subgraph modules
    auth[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    users[Infra_RedisCache]
  end

  subgraph protocols
    grpc[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    https[Infra_IngressController]
    mqtt[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    ws[Infra_IngressController]
  end

  subgraph schemas
    gql[Infra_RedisCache]
    openapi[Infra_WorkerNode]
    kafka[Infra_IngressController]
  end
repo_description: NestJs/Node.js backend template, multi-protocol and microservice design patterns support.
